title: Newly purchased 4a5g phone display not working
content: Hi, I just purchased a brand new pixel 4a 5G phone on February 11th. Only been 2 months . Now my phone screen isn’t working . The outer screen doesn’t even have a scratch. But the inner panel (bottom right panel) appears to have spider web cracks. and the screen is not working at all.  Please advise as to what to do about this . I am currently in Chennai , India (zip: 600095), planning to be here for a month or so. Thanks . I have warranty till feb 2022.
